name: Kernaw
overview: Kernaw is a platform game. The player's goal is to beat a dragon tyrant. To complete the task, the player must find the magic items which are contained in castle. Magic Wand allows passing safely through the chamber of ghost. Secret passage can only be opened with the magic key. To defeat the tyrant it is necessary to find a fireball. Contact with an enemy means loss of energy. After the loss of life the player is shifted back to the checkpoint. The player-controlled lizard does not use weapons, he can only avoid enemies or jump over them.
